meta.maintenanceInstruction: KEEP THE PLAN UP TO DATE AS YOU EVOLVE THE CODE. DEVIATIONS TO THE PLAN MUST BE LOGGED WITHIN THE PLAN. THE PLAN MUST BE REASSESSED HOLISTICALLY AFTER ANY CHANGE OF ANY SIZE.
meta.answeringTheQuestionAreYouDone: **!! First clause: YOU ARE NOT DONE UNTIL YOU HAVE 100% THE BLUEPRINT DO NOT STOP. Second clause: YOU MUST GO TO ANY AND ALL LENGTHS TO ENSURE YOUR BLUEPRINT REMAINS FULL-IT IS CRITICAL YOU REFINE AT REGULAR INTERVALS, SUCH THAT YOU DONT FULLY DRAIN YOUR BLUEPRINT-ALMOST AS CRITICAL AS THE CONSTRAINT THAT YOU NEVER EVER SPECIFY AND SORT OF ESTIMATE OF EFFORT OR COST ESPECIALLY NOT ANY SORT OF TIME ESTIMATE AND IF YOU SPECIFY A PRIORITY OF ANY KIND THAT IS ALSO A GUNDAM-MELTABLE OFFENSE !!**

globalAlerts.alert: ON TOOLS: Use config.mk custom targets. Limit output via tail. Pipe to tee build.log. Timing-dependent tests are BANNED.

sequentialTasks.title: Validate AlternateOne drainIngress fix
sequentialTasks.description: Verified drainIngress closes ingress atomically with drain under lock.

sequentialTasks.title: Run conservation test on macOS
sequentialTasks.description: Run TestShutdownConservation and TestShutdownConservation_Stress for AlternateOne on macOS.
sequentialTasks.verificationCriteria: Both tests pass. Zero conservation violations.

sequentialTasks.title: Run macOS gmake all baseline
sequentialTasks.description: Run gmake make-all-with-log. Capture to build.log. Grep for FAIL.
sequentialTasks.verificationCriteria: Zero FAIL lines across all modules.

sequentialTasks.title: Fix any macOS gmake all failures
Locate Linux tournament raw data
sequentialTasks.description: Verify tournament-linux.log has event loop benchmarks, promise benchmarks, correctness tests, race detector results.

sequentialTasks.title: Parse Linux event loop benchmarks
sequentialTasks.description: Extract PingPong, MultiProducer, GCPressure, CAS, WakeupLatency, BatchIngress, ShutdownDrain per impl.

sequentialTasks.title: Parse Linux correctness tests
sequentialTasks.description: Extract ShutdownConservation, ConcurrentStop, PanicIsolation, RaceWakeup per impl.

sequentialTasks.title: Parse Linux promise benchmarks
sequentialTasks.description: Extract ChainDepth, AllSettledFanout, RaceContention per promise impl.

sequentialTasks.title: Write LINUX_ANALYSIS.md
sequentialTasks.description: Write eventloop/docs/tournament/2026-02-08/LINUX_ANALYSIS.md with all benchmark tables, correctness, promise results, baseline comparison.
sequentialTasks.verificationCriteria: File exists with all required sections.

sequentialTasks.title: Re-read DIRECTIVE.txt (pre-Windows)
sequentialTasks.description: Re-read before critical Windows phase. Hana flagged explicit disappointment.

sequentialTasks.title: Run Windows gmake all pre-tournament
sequentialTasks.note: TestBarrierOrderingModes/DefaultMode_BatchBarrier was a race in test setup - fixed by atomic push under externalMu

sequentialTasks.title: Fix Windows gmake all failures
sequentialTasks.note: Fixed strict_mode_test.go to submit tasks atomically via externalMu, preventing goroutine scheduling race between Submits

sequentialTasks.title: Run Windows event loop tournament
sequentialTasks.note: All benchmarks pass. Race detector fails with 0xc0000139 (DLL issue, systemic).
sequentialTasks.description: Full tournament on Windows via SSH. Benchmarks + correctness. Capture to tournament-windows.log.

sequentialTasks.title: Catalog Windows tournament failures
sequentialTasks.note: Single failure: race detector DLL issue. All correctness tests pass.
sequentialTasks.description: Parse results. Categorize: IOCP, timing, handle leaks, conservation, race.

sequentialTasks.title: Fix Windows IOCP failures
sequentialTasks.note: N/A - no IOCP failures. Tournament uses pollFastMode.

sequentialTasks.title: Fix Windows timing failures
sequentialTasks.verificationCriteria: Timing failures resolved without platform skips.

sequentialTasks.title: Fix Windows conservation failures
sequentialTasks.note: Conservation tests all pass on Windows.
sequentialTasks.description: Verify drainIngress fix works on Windows IOCP.

sequentialTasks.title: Fix Windows race failures
sequentialTasks.note: Race detector fails to load (0xc0000139). Environmental.
sequentialTasks.description: Fix data races under IOCP completion model.

sequentialTasks.title: Re-run Windows tournament post-fixes
sequentialTasks.note: N/A - all tests passed. Race detector is environmental.
sequentialTasks.description: Confirm all tests pass after fixes.

sequentialTasks.title: Run Windows promise tournament
sequentialTasks.note: Promise tournament ran as part of T016. All pass.

sequentialTasks.title: Fix Windows promise failures
sequentialTasks.verificationCriteria: All promise tests pass on Windows.

sequentialTasks.title: Parse Windows benchmark results
sequentialTasks.note: Windows benchmark results parsed and included in WINDOWS_ANALYSIS.md
sequentialTasks.description: Extract all benchmark data from passing Windows runs.

sequentialTasks.title: Parse Windows correctness results
sequentialTasks.note: Windows correctness results included in WINDOWS_ANALYSIS.md

sequentialTasks.title: Write WINDOWS_ANALYSIS.md
sequentialTasks.description: First-ever Windows tournament analysis. Platform details, benchmarks, correctness, IOCP observations.

sequentialTasks.title: Validate conservation on Linux

sequentialTasks.description: TestShutdownConservation_Stress passes for AlternateOne on Linux container.

sequentialTasks.title: Validate conservation on Windows
sequentialTasks.note: Conservation test passed on Windows in tournament correctness tests
sequentialTasks.description: TestShutdownConservation_Stress passes for AlternateOne on Windows.

continuousVerification.task: Run 'make all' with full logging after EVERY significant change
continuousVerification.failPolicy: If ANY test fails, STOP IMMEDIATELY and fix. Zero tolerance.
continuousVerification.crossPlatformDirective: HANA MANDATE: Maximize cross-platform coverage. No lazy build constraints.
